name: REAVER (itch) (Chromatic Window, Nobongo, Zach Northrop, johhhh)
name_original: REAVER (itch) (Chromatic Window, Nobongo, Zach Northrop, johhhh)
description:
REAVER is a fast paced magical FPS where you fight hordes of mysterious beings that detonate if you get too close!

Harvest their souls to level up, and survive against the onslaught for as long as you can!

Controls
  • Mouse - Aim
  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Left Click (Hold) - Shoot
  • Right Click (Hold) - Harvest
How To Play

Harvesting souls fills up a meter at the bottom of the screen, once it fills you'll be able to level up and become stronger.

Leveling up will also restore some health!

Enemies blow up if they get too close to you, so be sure to keep your distance and watch your back!

Survive as long as you can, things will only get more difficult the longer you hold out!
